text: He felt the camel envying the bull's horns, and wanted to get his own. For this he went to Zeus, asking him to give him horns like those of a bull. But Zeus, indignant that he was not content with his great size and strength, not only refused to give him the horns, but also cut off part of his ears. Envy is not productive.
title: El camello y Zeus
author: nan Esopo
